text: The Men's sprint event of the 2017 UCI Track Cycling World Championships was held on 14 and 15 April 2017. ==Results== ===Qualifying=== The top four riders advanced directly to the 1/8 finals; places 5 to 28 advanced to the 1/16 final. {|class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
